title: when can i start earning loot again?
body: so i had a chat restriction, now i'm ineligible to earn loot, but its been ages since i had the restriction like when will i be able to get chests and stuff again because it really annoying.

replies.body: You will be eligible for loot once you show the system that you can show sportsmanlike behaviour and not keep up negative habits (also depends on the severity of the chat restriction)
